channel.title: Full data feed
channel.description: This is the main feed for your online product data for Google Shopping and should be submitted at least every 30 days.

item.title: Professional Grade Deluxe 14 Piece Premium Non-Stick Bakeware Set
item.description:
Roll up your sleeves and dive into the wonderful world of baking with this professional-grade 14-piece deluxe premium non-stick bakeware set. This complete set includes two round non-stick cake pans, a large rectangular cake pan, a loaf pan, a 12 cup non-stick muffin pan, a cookie sheet, three mixing bowls, three heat-resistant bowl shaped silicone spatulas, a stainless steel measuring cup set and a stainless steel measuring spoon set. With this deluxe professional-grade 14-piece premium non-stick bakeware set you will be whipping up cakes, cookies, muffins and other delicious baked goods in no time.
 
Set Includes:
  • 8" Round Cake Pans (2)
  • 20" x 14" Aluminum Cookie Sheet
  • 13" x 9" x 2-1/4" Rectangular Cake Pan
  • 12-Cup Muffin Pan
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan, 8-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-3/4"
  • 3/4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 4 Piece Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set with Wire Handles
  • 4 Piece Deluxe Stainless Steel Measuring Spoon Set

item.title: Professional-Grade 12-Piece Premium Non-Stick Bakeware Set
item.description:
Channel your inner pastry chef using this professional-grade 12-piece premium non-stick bakeware set. The non-stick pieces include a cookie sheet, a loaf pan, a jumbo muffin pan and two 8” round cake pans. With premium non-stick coating, these bakeware pieces offer premium food release for easy cleanup. The set also includes three mixing bowls, three heat-resistant bowl shaped silicone spatulas, and a 4-piece measuring cup set. Each piece in this set pairs well together, so you can bake delicate goods with ease.

Set Includes:
  • Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan
  • Hard Anodized Aluminum Cookie Sheet, 20" x 14"
  • Non-Stick 6 Cup Jumbo Muffin Pan
  • 2 Hard Anodized Aluminum 8" Round Cake Pans
  • 3/4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 4 Piece Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set

item.title: 4 Piece Deluxe Professional Non-Stick Round Cake Pan Set
item.description:
The classic round shape that every baker needs, this key bakeware set was designed with the professional baker in mind. Made to withstand the rigorous test of the commercial oven, these hard anodized aluminum non-stick cake pans can take quite the "beating." This set includes one 8", two 10", and one 12" diameter hard anodized aluminum non-stick cake pan. Each cake pan is 1.0 mm thick and 2" deep.
 
Set Includes:
  • Deluxe Hard Anodized Aluminum Professional 8" Round Cake Pan, 2" Depth
  • 2 Deluxe Hard Anodized Aluminum Professional 10" Round Cake Pans, 2" Depth
  • Deluxe Hard Anodized Aluminum Professional 12" Round Cake Pan, 2" Depth

item.title: 3 Piece Aluminum Sheet Pan Set with 2 Oven Mitts
item.description:
Whether you are baking cookies or oven roasting vegetables, this aluminum sheet pan set can be used to create a whole meal from appetizers to dessert. Equipped with a pair of quilted flame-retardant oven mitts, this set also includes three different sized aluminum sheet pans. Line the small aluminum baking sheet with petite quiche pies for guests to enjoy light hors d'oeuvres before dinner. The medium aluminum sheet pan is the perfect size for baking cookies or pie for an after-dinner treat. Offering a generous surface space, the large aluminum sheet pan can be used to cook a roast or bake a whole batch of delicate French macaroons. This baking set is the ideal bridal shower or housewarming gift.

Set Includes:
  • 1/4-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 9-1/2" x 13"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"
  • 2/3-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 16" x 22"
  • 17" Flame-Retardant Oven Mitts (2)

item.title: Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat & Aluminum Sheet Pan Set with 2 Oven Mitts
item.description:
This set is a pastry chef’s dream, as it includes an aluminum baking sheet pan, a silicone baking mat and a pair of flame-retardant oven mitts. Reinforced with a galvanized wire, the baking sheet pan is designed to keep its shape in high temperatures while baking, roasting, or broiling. The silicone baking mat provides the perfect baking surface with its non-stick material and allows for consistent and even heat distribution. With a pair of quilted flame-retardant oven mitts, you can keep your hands and arms safe from hot surfaces while baking and cooking. All the pieces complement each other to make the perfect baking set.
 
Set Includes:
  • Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 11-7/8" x 16-1/2"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"
  • 17" Flame-Retardant Oven Mitts (2)

item.title: Butterfly Cookie Cutter Set with Half-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan and Silicone Baking Mat
item.description:
Containing all the essentials for baking your signature cookies, this starter set includes an 8-piece butterfly cookie cutter set, an aluminum sheet pan, and a silicone baking mat. Curated to assist amateur and professional bakers alike, this set offers the tools to transform your dough into various butterfly shapes with the 8-piece cookie cutter set. Each piece is made from commercial-grade materials for durable use.

Set Includes:

  • 8-Piece Stainless Steel Butterfly Cookie Cutter Set
  • Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 11-7/8" x 16-1/2"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"

item.title: Professional Grade Premium Non-Stick Muffin & Loaf Pan Set
item.description:
Ideal for the occasional baker, this professional-grade premium non-stick muffin pan, and loaf pan set offers a variety of uses. Whether you are baking something sweet, such as cupcakes or muffins, or savory, like a mini egg frittata, this set offers excellent heat transfer for even baking and consistent results every time.

Set Includes:

  • Deluxe Carbon Steel Professional Non-Stick 12 Cup (3 Oz. / Cup) Muffin Pan
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan, 8-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-3/4"

item.title: 9 Piece Pastry Master Starter Set
item.description:
Blend, roll, cut and bake delectable treats using this 9-piece master pastry set, which includes a pie blender, a silicone baking mat, a French rolling pin and six color-coded flexible cutting mats. The pie blender and French rolling pin are the perfect partners in kneading dough and rolling out pie crusts. With its non-stick surface, the baking mat offers consistent and even heat distribution while baking. Available in six different colors, the flexible cutting mat makes transferring ingredients from counter to pan a breeze, perfect for prepping apples to bake a homemade crisp. Designed for unbeatable performance, the pie blender, silicone baking mat, French rolling pin and the color coded flexible cutting mats are crafted from professional-grade materials, made for everyday use.

Set Includes

  • Stainless Steel 7-Blade Perfect Pastry
  • 2/3-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 14 5/8" x 20-1/2"
  • 20" Tapered French Wooden Rolling Pin
  • Assorted Color Flexible Cutting Mats, 12" x 18", 6 Pack

item.title: Variety Cookie Cutter Set with Half-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan and Silicone Baking Mat
item.description:
Delicious cookies come in all shapes and sizes when using this Variety Cookie Baking set. Curated for bakers to transform their cookies into fun shapes, this set includes a 12-piece variety cookie cutter set, an aluminum sheet pan, and a silicone baking mat. Whether you are learning the basics of baking or sharing your expert knowledge, this kit gives you the tools needed to create lively cookies without the use of unhealthy greasing. Each piece is made from commercial-grade materials for durable use.

Set Includes:

  • 12 Piece Variety Cookie Cutter Set
  • Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 11-7/8" x 16-1/2"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"

item.title: Holiday Season Cookie Cutter Set with Half-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan and Silicone Baking Mat
item.description:
Embrace the holiday spirit and spread some joy with this Holiday Cookie Baking Set. Dessert is a must-have at the end of a filling meal, and this set gives you all the pieces needed to pop some delicious holiday-themed desserts into the oven for all to enjoy. Whether you are an amateur or professional baker, there is fun to be had while crafting themed pancakes, cutting brownies and cakes, or simply baking an assortment of cookies. Each piece is made from commercial-grade materials for durable use.

Set Includes:

  • 8-Piece Stainless Steel Butterfly Cookie Cutter Set
  • Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 11-7/8" x 16-1/2"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"

item.title: 9 Piece Mixing Essentials Kit
item.description:
Whether you are an amateur baker or a full-fledged culinary artist, this 9-piece mixing essentials kit can accommodate all of your baking and cooking needs. Equipped with four silicone-bottomed mixing bowls, three heat-resistant bowl shaped silicone spatulas, a 4-piece measuring cup, and a 4-piece measuring spoon set, this kit includes the basic tools you need to prepare a homemade meal or treat. Use the slip-resistant bowls to marinade meats and vegetables for grilling or to mix ingredients to bake a birthday cake. Designed to be used in high temperatures, the heat-resistant bowl shaped silicone spatulas are the ideal for scraping ingredients off the sides of bowls or scrambling eggs on the stovetop. Both the measuring cups and spoons help you to measure with precision and ease. Complete with everything you need to start cooking and baking in the kitchen, this 15-piece mixing essentials kit makes for great housewarming or bridal shower gift.

Set Includes

  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base
  • 8 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 4 Piece Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set with Wire Handles
  • 4 Piece Deluxe Stainless Steel Measuring Spoon Set

item.title: Cake Decorator's Starter's Kit
item.description:
With this cake decorator’s starter’s kit, you can finally make all of those decorative cupcakes and cakes you have been seeing on your favorite cooking show. This starter set is equipped with a cotton pastry bag, a 2-piece plastic coupling, and a stainless steel 24 tip cake decorating set. Whether you’re looking to replicate a simple design or ready to roll up your sleeves to create an ornate rose swirl, this cake decorator’s starter’s kit is complete with all of the tools you need to channel your kitchen creativity.

Set Includes

  • Cotton 16" Pastry Bag, with Plastic-Coated Interior
  • Stainless Steel 24 Tip Cake Decorating Set
  • Plastic 2-Piece Coupling Set

item.title: 12 Piece Measuring Kit with Mixing Bowls, Measuring Spoon Set, and Measuring Cup Set
item.description:
Mix, measure, and marinate your way to delicious recipes using this 12 piece measuring kit. With stainless steel mixing bowls and measuring spoons and cups, you’ll be able to measure just the right amount of ingredients to create your next masterpiece. Whether you are cooking or baking, accurate measurements and good mixing bowls are vital, and with this mirror-finished set, you’ll have just what you need.

  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 4 Piece Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set
  • 4 Piece Deluxe Stainless Steel Measuring Spoon Set

item.title: 6-Piece Stainless Steel Mirror-Finish Mixing Bowl Set
item.description:
Having a good mixing bowl is a necessity in every kitchen, but with this 6-piece stainless steel mixing bowl set, you’ll have a bowl for every task. Mix your ingredients, create sauces, marinate meats, and more all at once without the hassle of going through cabinets to find containers large enough to do the job. With these mirror-finish bowls varying in size from ¾ quarts to 8 quarts, you’ll have the right pieces for every recipe. For convenience, these mixing bowls are dishwasher safe.

  • 3/4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 8 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl

item.title: Letters Cookie Cutter Set with Half-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan and Silicone Baking Mat
item.description:
Celebrate a birthday, holiday, and any other special occasion with this Letter Cookie Baking Set. Use it to surprise your loved ones with personalized messages, or simply get creative with the words you can create while enjoying a sweet treat. This set is perfect for practicing baking and spelling with your young ones, as they’ll have a hard time saying no to home-baked goodies. Each piece is made from commercial-grade materials for durable use.

Set Includes:

  • 26 Piece Letter Cookie Cutter Set
  • Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 11-7/8" x 16-1/2"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"

item.title: Circular Pastry Set with Half-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan and Silicone Baking Mat
item.description:
With all the pieces you need to mold and bake classic round cookies, this set is the perfect way to enjoy home-baked goodies during any time of year. The cookie cutter set features 11 sizes to choose from, so you can line the baking sheet and mat with a variety of sizes based on your preference. Whether you are an amateur or professional baker, you can use this set to create perfect pancakes, cut brownies and cakes, or simply bake an assortment of cookies. Each piece is made from commercial-grade materials for durable use.

Set Includes:

  • 11 Piece Plain Round Cookie Cutter Set
  • Half-Size Silicone Baking Mat, 11-7/8" x 16-1/2"
  • 1/2-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 13" x 18"

item.title: Non-Stick Loaf and Muffin Pan Set, Large
item.description:
Ideal for the occasional baker, this professional-grade premium non-stick muffin and loaf pan set offers a variety of uses. Whether you are baking sweet cupcakes or savory banana bread, this set offers excellent heat transfer for even baking and consistent results every time. Use this kit to create larger portions for holidays and events, or to save ample amounts of leftovers for all to enjoy again.

Set Includes:

  • Aluminized Steel Non-Stick 1-1/2 Lb. Loaf Pan, 10" x 5" x 3"
  • Carbon Steel Non-Stick 6 Cup Jumbo Muffin Pan

item.title: 9" Hard Anodized Aluminum Non-Stick Springform Pan with 3 Piece Spatula Set
item.description:
You’ll be on your way to mixing cake batter for quick and even baking of your favorite desserts with this 4-piece baking set. Whether you’re in the mood for baking cheesecakes, mousse cakes, fruit tarts, or another sweet or savory treat, this kit will help you along and make it easy for you to craft a faultless cake. With three different heat-resistant spatulas and a springform pan that makes releasing cakes easy, this set is ideal to perfect your celebratory cake recipes.

Set Includes:

  • 9" Anodized Non-Stick Aluminum Springform Pan
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula

item.title: 3 Piece Deluxe Professional Non-Stick Cake and Muffin Pan Set
item.description:
Ideal for the occasional baker, this set is designed to create delicious desserts everyone will love. The professional-grade premium non-stick surface of the cake and muffin pans offers excellent heat distribution to bake your treats efficiently and evenly whether they’re sweet chocolate cakes or savory egg frittatas.

Set Includes:

  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick Rectangular Cake Pan, 13" x 9" x 2-1/4"
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick Square Cake Pan, 8" x 8" x 2-1/4"
  • Deluxe Carbon Steel Professional Non-Stick 12 Cup (3 Oz. / Cup) Muffin Pan

item.title: Full-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan and Cover Set
item.description:
Baking and transporting a large batch of fresh desserts to any event is easy and convenient with this full-sized aluminum sheet pan and cover set. Use the aluminum sheet to bake not only cookies and pastries, but also oven-roasted vegetables, homemade granola, and more. Whether you need to store your dish for later or move it to your outdoor dining area, the plastic cover will help keep your food protected while preserving its quality and taste.

Set Includes:

  • Full-Size Aluminum Sheet Pan, 18" x 26"
  • Cover for 18" x 26" Sheet Pan, PP"


*Please note -- this item does not qualify for free shipping.

item.title: 3 Piece Deluxe Professional Non-Stick Cake Pan Set
item.description:
Created for bakers of all cakes, this 3-piece professional-grade premium non-stick pan set offers a variety of sizes for your sweet and savory desserts. This versatile set can also be used to bake cheesy lasagna and cook up a roast dinner to pair with your desserts. The aluminized steel design offers superior heat transfer to bake your dishes evenly throughout, while the Quantum2 coating offers easy release every time. These pans feature a wire-in reinforced rim to keep them from warping over time.

Set Includes:

  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick Rectangular Cake Pan, 13" x 9" x 2-1/4"
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick Square Cake Pan, 8" x 8" x 2-1/4"
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan, 8-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-3/4"

item.title: The Connoisseur's Cake Decorator Kit
item.description:
The art of cake decorating is at your fingertips with this Connoisseur’s Cake Decorating Kit. With 52 decorating tips and 2 metal flower nails, you’ll be well on your way to creating festive and personalized decorations for all your cakes, cupcakes, and other sweet treats. Ideal for the professional baker and those who want to perfect their skills, this kit comes also comes with a reusable pastry bag and a 2-piece coupling set, so you have everything you need and more!

Set Includes:

  • Cotton 12" Pastry Bag with Plastic-Coated Interior
  • Stainless Steel 52 Tip Cake Decorating Set
  • Plastic 2-Piece Coupling Set

item.title: Muffin and Loaf Pan Set with 1 Qt. Measuring Cup
item.description:
Measure just the right amount of oil and milk to bake your homemade yellow cake with this muffin and loaf pan set with a 1 Qt. measuring cup. Ideal for the occasional baker, this professional-grade premium non-stick muffin pan and loaf pan also offers a variety of everyday uses such as baking delicious egg frittatas for breakfast, stuffed lasagna for lunch, and savory meatloaf for dinner. With the added bonus of the measuring cup, you won’t have any shortage of necessary ingredients in your evenly-baked dishes.

Set Includes:

  • Deluxe Carbon Steel Professional Non-Stick 12 Cup (3 Oz. / Cup) Muffin Pan
  • Deluxe Aluminized Steel Professional Non-Stick 1 Lb. Loaf Pan, 8-1/2" x 4-1/2" x 2-3/4"
  • Deluxe Stackable Break-Resistant Plastic 1 Quart Measuring Cup with Color Graduations

item.title: Single-Serve Compact K-Cup Coffee Brewer
item.description: A fresh cup of rich coffee is minutes away when using this single-serve K-Cup coffee brewer. The single-serve model is perfect for use in your home, dorm room, and office, and is compact enough to fit comfortably on your desk or to take with you on a trip. The single-button design lets you sit back as the brewer prepares your mug of coffee and auto shuts off immediately afterward to save energy. For convenient cleaning, the bottom tray slides out for quick rinsing and drying. Made to accommodate most cup sizes, the removable bottom tray allows you to fill your larger cups or travel mugs up to 5-1/2" tall with steaming-hot coffee in 3 minutes. This coffee brewer is K-cup compatible and has a 12-ounce capacity. Ideal for gifting on birthdays and holidays.

item.title: 9 Piece Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl and Silicone Spatula Set
item.description:
Become a mixing master with this 9 piece mixing bowl and silicone spatula set. Whether it’s for a party of one or for an actual celebration, use the appropriate sized stainless steel bowl to mix just the right amount of ingredients needed for not only your baking needs but also for preparing everyday meals. Paired with silicone spatulas designed to follow the contours of the mixing bowls, they are excellent to use for scraping down every last bit of batter for your delicious treats. This set is ideal for mixing seasonings, beating eggs, stirring batters, whipping up sauces, tossing salads, and more.

Set Includes

  • 3/4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 8 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula

item.title: 10 Piece Mixing Bowl, Measuring Spoons, and Silicone Spatula Set
item.description:
Create your favorite recipes with this versatile 10 piece mixing bowl, spoon, and spatula set. Packed with all the pieces needed to prepare, measure, store, and mix your ingredients to perfection, this set is guaranteed to find regular use in your kitchen. Use the measuring spoons to combine just the right amount of ingredients in your dinner to make it flavorful and delicious. Whether your recipe calls for mixing a lot or mixing a little, you have the choice of using a shallow stainless steel or a deep stainless steel bowl. With silicone spatulas designed to follow the contours of both of these mixing bowls, you will have no issues with scraping down every last bit of batter or seasoning to get the most out of your meal. Whisk up a few eggs to prepare an omelet, stir up some cake batter for a sweet dessert, or even hand-toss a salad for even dressing distribution.

Set Includes

  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 4 Piece Deluxe Stainless Steel Measuring Spoon Set
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl with Black Silicone Base

item.title: 6 Piece Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl and Silicone Spatula Set
item.description:
Preparing a small batch of cookies or a large platter of brownies is not a problem when you have this versatile 6 piece mixing bowl and spatula set. Custom designed with three varying bowl sizes, you will always have just the right amount of bowl for your batter, salads, seasonings, and more. Paired with heat-resistant silicone spatulas that are crafted to seamlessly follow the contours of the bowls, scraping off every last bit of dough or dressing is effortless, allowing you to create flavorful dishes and meals.

Set Includes

  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula

item.title: 9 Piece Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl, Measuring Cup, and Silicone Spatula Set
item.description:
Whether you are an amateur baker or a full-fledged culinary artist, this 9-piece mixing essentials kit can accommodate all of your baking and cooking needs. Equipped with four stainless steel mixing bowls, three heat-resistant bowl shaped silicone spatulas, a 4-piece measuring cup, and a 4-piece measuring spoon set, this kit includes the basic tools you need to prepare a homemade meal or treat. Use the bowls to marinade meats and vegetables for grilling or to mix ingredients to bake a birthday cake. Designed to be used in high temperatures, the heat-resistant bowl shaped silicone spatulas are the ideal for scraping ingredients off the sides of bowls or scrambling eggs on the stovetop. Both the measuring cups and spoons help you to measure with precision and ease. Complete with everything you need to start cooking and baking in the kitchen, this 15-piece mixing essentials kit makes for great housewarming or bridal shower gift.

Set Includes

  • 1-1/2 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 3 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 4 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 5 Qt. Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
  • 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 14" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 16-1/4" Heat-Resistant Bowl Shaped Silicone Spatula
  • 4 Piece Stainless Steel Measuring Cup Set with Wire Handles
  • 4 Piece Deluxe Stainless Steel Measuring Spoon Set

item.title: Non-stick 5-Piece Rose Gold Bakeware Set with Red Silicone Grips
item.description:
Bake to your heart’s content with this 5-piece rose gold bakeware set. With two three cake pans, a loaf pan, and a cookie sheet, this set is ideal for baking cakes, cookies, and breads. The red silicone grips make transferring your sweet concoctions from counter, to oven, to tabletop easy and efficient. Whether you’re hosting a birthday party or baking for enjoyment, use this set to create a variety of cakes and cookies to treat your family and guests. Even use the pieces in this set to roast a chicken with a side of oven-roasted vegetables for dinner. Made of carbon steel, these pieces have superior heat transfer to ensure consistent baking results every time. The non-stick Xylan coating delivers easy food release for all your dishes, making cleanup quick and efficient.

Set Includes

  • Two 9” Round Cake Pans
  • One 10” x 15” Cookie Sheet
  • One 9” x 13” Cake Pan
  • One Loaf Pan

item.title: Premium Deluxe Non-Stick 4-Piece Bakeware Set with Quantum2 Coating
item.description:
Begin your baking adventures using this deluxe 4-piece bakeware set. With two 9” round cake pans, a 6-cup muffin pan, and one cookie sheet, you will be on your way to crafting delicious concoctions for all to try. Create layered cakes for birthdays, blueberry muffins for breakfasts, and homemade sugar cookies for dessert. Designed to be versatile, you can also pop these dishes into the oven to make delectable egg frittatas or to oven-roast vegetables for a healthy side dish. The Quantum2 coating gives these pieces a smooth non-stick finish for easy release of all treats, so you can rest assured that they remain in one piece.

Set Includes

  • Two 9” Round Cake Pans
  • One 6-cup Muffin Pan
  • One 10” x 15” Cookie Sheet

item.title: Premium Deluxe Non-Stick 6-Piece Bakeware Set
item.description:
Stock your kitchen all at once with this deluxe 6-piece bakeware set. Designed with your needs in mind, this set features a variety of bakeware that will find everyday use in your kitchen. Create layered cakes for birthdays, blueberry muffins for breakfasts, and homemade sugar cookies for dessert. Assembled to be versatile, you can also pop these dishes into the oven to make delectable egg frittatas, or to oven-roast chicken, turkey, and vegetables for a balanced meal. The Quantum2 coating gives these pieces a smooth non-stick finish for easy release of all treats, so you can rest assured that they remain in one piece. This set includes two 8” round cake pans, one 12-cup muffin pan, one cookie sheet, one rectangular cake pan, and a loaf pan.

Set Includes

  • Two 8” Round Cake Pans
  • One 12 Cup Muffin Pan
  • One 10” x 15” Cookie Sheet
  • One 9” x 13” Cake Pan
  • One Loaf Pan

item.title: Premium Deluxe Non-Stick 8-Piece Bakeware Set
item.description:
Fulfill all of your baking and cooking adventures with this deluxe 8-piece bakeware set. Created to cater to all of your kitchen needs, this set features a variety of pieces that you are guaranteed to use for everyday cooking and baking. Craft layered cakes with a side of beautifully decorated cupcakes for birthdays, oven-roast juicy meats for dinner, and pop some homemade chocolate chip cookies into the oven for dessert. The Quantum2 coating gives these pieces a smooth non-stick finish for easy release of all treats, so you can rest assured that they remain in one piece. This set includes two 8” round cake pans, one 12-cup muffin pan, two cookie sheets, one rectangular cake pan, one 8” square cake pan, and a loaf pan.

Set Includes

item.title: 5-Piece Bakeware Set with Silicone Grips, Rose Gold and Red
item.description:
Bake to your heart’s content with this 5-piece rose gold bakeware set. Ideal for baking cakes for all occasions, the red silicone grips make transferring the product from counter, to oven, to tabletop easy and efficient. Whether you are hosting a birthday party or baking for enjoyment, use this set to create a variety of cakes and cookies to treat your family and guests. Even use the large pan to roast a chicken with a side of vegetables for dinner. Made of carbon steel, these pieces have superior heat transfer to ensure consistent baking results every time. The non-stick Xylan coating delivers easy food release for all your dishes, making cleanup quick and efficient.

Set Includes:

  • Two 9” Round Cake Pans
  • One 8” Square Cake Pan
  • One 10” x 15” Cookie Sheet
  • One 9” x 13” Cake Pan

item.title: 30 Piece Purple Full Kitchen Essentials Set
item.description:
Craft a batch of sweet funfetti cupcakes or create your famous indulgent brownies with this 30-piece baking set. The ideal set for any beginning baker who enjoys the convenience of silicone, this lively kit contains all of the essentials necessary to bake cupcakes, muffins, cakes, and more. From the scale and measuring cups that can measure the amount of flour you need for your chocolate chip muffins, to the spatula and bowls you’ll use to mix your brilliant recipes together, the pieces in this set will become your kitchen staples.

Set Includes

  • One Square Shape Silicone Cake Mold
  • One 6-Cup Silicone Cake Mold
  • 6-Piece Small Silicone Cake Molds
  • One Electronic Scale
  • 2-Piece Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls
  • 8-Piece Baking Tool Set
  • 11-Piece Plastic Measuring Set
